thread.title_full: Virtuoso Honors Travel Experts As Luxury Travel Industry Leader At 27th Annual Virtuoso Travel WeekTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Virtuoso Honors Travel Experts As Luxury Travel Industry Leader At 27th Annual Virtuoso Travel WeekTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Virtuoso Honors Travel Experts As Luxury Travel Industry Leader At 27th Annual Virtuoso Travel Week
International luxury travel network Virtuoso® has announced the winners of its prestigious Virtuoso Awards, which honor the network’s finest travel advisors, agencies and preferred partners. Virtuoso recognized Travel Experts as the winner of the Top Year-Over-Year Revenue Growth Award and the Top Virtuoso Air Production Award at its Opening Session on August 9 at Bellagio Resort & Casino in Las Vegas, which opened the annual Virtuoso Travel Week conference.
The Virtuoso Awards allow travel industry peers to recognize each other’s accomplishments. The network’s travel providers vote for agencies and advisors, while agency members vote for preferred suppliers. This year Virtuoso received more than 12,000 votes from advisors and suppliers.
“Virtuoso’s selective acceptance process means that only the world’s top travel professionals are part of our network,” said Matthew D. Upchurch, CEO of Virtuoso. “Because of that, the peer-to-peer Virtuoso Awards are an especially valued industry recognition. Winners such as Travel Experts elevate this network and the entire luxury travel industry with their unique contributions.”
“I am honored to accept these prestigious awards on behalf of Travel Experts,” said Susan Ferrell, president of Travel Experts. “We applaud the entrepreneurial nature of our independent travel advisors and the demonstrated commitment of excellence of our support staff without whom these awards would be possible.”
Source:-Virtuoso
